articles.description: A TikTok user named @tameekalal has gone viral online after sharing a hilarious video of a man opening a rather mean gift from a loved one on Christmas Day
articles.content:
When it comes to Christmas gifts, some people like to find the perfect present, while others prefer prank items.
 One family from America clearly has a tradition of getting each other hilarious stuf… [+1784 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea 'make Erling Haaland priority summer signing' as Lampard eyes Dortmund striker - Daily Mail
articles.description: Haaland is one of the most sought after strikers in the world, having already scored almost 100 senior career goals despite being just 20-years-old. Now, three Premier League teams are linked.
articles.content:
Chelsea are set to join the race to sign Borussia Dortmund starlet Erling Haaland after Frank Lampard told his board the Norwegian is to 'become the top target,' according to reports.
